name: TheBlogofRoss
0:
”Alexa, open blog of ross”
”Alexa, ask blog of ross for the latest update”
”Alexa, start blog of ross”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blog of ross
Developer Terms of Use
des: This 'blogcast' is automatically generated from the blog posts hosted at RossWickman.com. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
